text: Hey Raman - Let's see if we can troubleshoot this.
Can you please detail out the use case so I can get an understand how you are integrating HubSpot with CyberSource?

Hi <@U05R380MLMC> yes sure let me explain ... I want   to create the checkout page with single  product where at  last customer will redirect to cybersource <https://testsecureacceptance.cybersource.com/paymentmethods> where user will fill information and pay via card once its done it should redirect the user on HubSpot website page with the status  of the payment which  cybersource   send via form post method which  I am unable    to receive in HubSpot either on page nor on post serverless api

This is interesting....

1.) HubSpot > CyberSource > Payment > Success > HubSpot

What URL are you using for the redirect back to HubSpot? My assumption here is you'll need to include some query string parameters to pass the context along to HubSpot

2.) The tricky part here is that you are saying CyberSource sends a POST upon payment, kinda like a webhook which contains all the information you need/want to display back to the customer on the website.

3.) When it comes to integrating your website with a third-party payment vendor and all the nuiansances that go into this, there will need to be significant time spend uncovering the details. Send me a DM if you want to explore ways we can help you get this fully implemented as a paid engagement.
Yes sure give me few mints we will connect
